hypothesis_content.title: MSTR Extreme Daily Deviation from NAV Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates by more than +20% or -15% from its implied Bitcoin NAV per share, the deviation will revert by at least one-third within 5 trading days, provided the crypto market is not in a STRESS regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a Bitcoin proxy. Large premiums/discounts to NAV attract arbitrage (via creation/redemption mechanisms for some funds, or direct BTC/MSTR pairs). The asymmetry in thresholds reflects historical premium bias.
entry_conditions: |(MSTR Price / Implied BTC NAV) - 1| > threshold (+0.20 or -0.15)
Enter on the next day's open: Long MSTR if premium is negative (< -15%), Short if premium is positive (> +20%)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Deviation worsens by an additional 10 percentage points

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The mean reversion of at least 33% occurs in less than 40% of qualifying signals over a 2-year backtest period.
